dimension:
16 1/2 x 10 5/8 in. (41.91 x 26.99 cm) (sheet, irregular)
23 3/4 x 19 3/4 in. (60.33 x 50.17 cm) (outer frame)
medium: Pen and brown ink over faint black chalk, squared in red chalk on thin laid paper (recto); black chalk on heavier paper (verso)
title: The Annunciation (recto); Serving Boy (verso)
description: recto:  angel standing on cloud at right, with PR arm upraised; kneeling Mary at left with wrists crossed, hands on chest; cherubs in clouds overhead; another smaller angel, ULC; squared off in a grid in red; verso not examined--received framed
